SEARCH
Package src.login_system

Class Login

java.lang.Object
src.login_system.Login
public class Login extends Object
The Login class provides functionality for user authentication and login. It includes methods for logging in, logging out, and checking user credentials.

The class stores information about the current user and their role (staff or student). It also includes a method to reset the user's password if it is set to the default value.

Since:
2023-11-26
Version:
1.0
Author:
Aaron
